data.actual_result: The channel won't load and there's an error in the console
data.short_description: Posting an emoticon in a masked link content through a webhook prevents the channel where the webhook posted the link from loading
data.steps_to_repro: - use Canary or PTB, the issue isn't present in the stable build - Create a webhook - Post on the webhook with {content: "[:emoticon:](link)"} - Refresh your client (CTRL+R) - Look at the channel
